detailsData.title: Personalized, Sustainable Approach
detailsData.content: Amy uses her in-depth experience to create strategies for addressing complex commercial real estate matters. She facilitates moving your project forward efficiently.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: Amy Brimah has over 20 years of experience working in a variety of sectors and industries. She counsels local and national clients in all types of commercial real estate transactions.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Legal Services
detailsData.content: Amy works with clients on the development of multi-use, multi-family, industrial and other types of projects. She also has years of experience in the formation of condominiums/planned communities.

detailsData.title: Active Community Involvement
detailsData.content: Amy is actively involved with the Colorado Bar Association and has served on a variety of non-profit boards. She was named Colorado Super Lawyers for five consecutive years.

address: 3900 E. Mexico Ave, Suite 300, Denver, CO, 80210
subHeading: Innovative Representation for Today’s Commercial Real Estate Market
valueProp: Brimah LLP was founded in 2014 by Amy Brimah after leaving big law to provide focused legal advocacy for business owners, developers and investors with their commercial real estate interests. With over 20 years of experience in the Colorado real estate market, she provides no-nonsense legal counsel for today’s commercial real estate matters.
openHours: Mon-Fri: 9am-5pm, Sat-Sun: by prior appointment only

testimonalData.text: Amy Brimah provided exceptional legal counsel for our commercial real estate project.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Her expertise in land use and planning was invaluable to our development.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: We highly recommend Brimah LLP for any commercial real estate legal needs.
testimonalData.author: Michael Johnson
